Topic.Title: How do I delete my Text Adventures account?

Posts.EditableText: I have been struggling to get into contact with Text Adventures' staff team and I would like to delete/remove my account as I don't want it anymore. If someone is able to help me then please do as I just don't want a text adventures account anymore.
